title: Art and Picture Book Activity: The Bedroom
copy: What can you guess about the person who lives in this room? Use clues to learn about Vincent van Gogh and the unique decorations in his bedroom. Try the read aloud link for “The Napping House” by Audrey Wood to explore scenes from a window in your house or school. Designed especially for young learners, this resource offers creative ideas for looking at and responding to art together.   Illinois Early Learning Standards: Learning Standard 2.D Establish personal connection with books. Learning Standard 12.F Explore changes related to the weather and seasons.
